languages.text: "А почему нет?" {n}Джай легкомысленно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Разве не счастье для ваших слуг знать, что их госпо{mf|дин|жа} проводит часы досуга в радости?"
"Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"
languages.original_text: "А почему нет?" {n}Джай легкомысленно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Разве не счастье для ваших слуг знать, что их госпо{mf|дин|жа} проводит часы досуга в радости?"

traits.locale_text: "And why not?" {n}Jae shrugs lightheartedly{/n} "Are your servants not happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress}'s leisure in joyful?"
"And why not?" {n}Jae shrugs lightheartedly{/n} "Are your servants not happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress}'s leisure in joyful?"
"And why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress}'s leisure time is rather enjoyable?"
"And why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress}'s leisure time is rather enjoyable?"
"Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"
"Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi pas ? {n}réplique Jae en haussant joyeusement les épaules.{/n} Vos serviteurs ne seraient-ils pas heureux de savoir que leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} profite agréablement de son temps libre ? »
languages.original_text: "Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"

traits.locale_text: « Et pourquoi pas ? {n}Jae hausse joyeusement les épaules.{/n} Vos serviteurs ne seraient-ils pas heureux de savoir que leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} profite agréablement de son temps libre ? »

languages.text: “有何不可呢？”{n}婕伊愉悦地耸了耸肩。{/n}“如果你的仆人们知道，他们的{mf|主人|女主人}度过了一段愉快的闲暇时光，他们不该为你感到开心吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"

traits.locale_text: “有何不可呢？”{n}婕伊愉悦地耸了耸肩。{/n}“如果你的仆人们知道，他们的{mf|主人|女主人}度过了一段愉快的闲暇时光，他们不该为你感到开心吗？”

languages.text: "Warum nicht?" {n}Jae zuckt fröhlich mit den Schultern.{/n} "Würde es Eure Diener nicht freuen, wenn sie wissen, dass {mf|ihr Herr seine Freizeit|ihre Herrin ihre Freizeit} genießt?"
languages.original_text: "Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"

traits.locale_text: "Und warum nicht?" {n}Jae zuckt fröhlich mit den Schultern.{/n} "Würde es Eure Diener nicht freuen, wenn sie wissen, dass {mf|ihr Herr seine Freizeit|ihre Herrin ihre Freizeit} genießt?"

languages.text: «¿Por qué no?». {n}Jae se encoge de hombros con un gesto alegre.{/n} «Seguro que sus sirvientes se alegran de saber que su {mf|señor|señora} disfruta de su tiempo libre».
languages.original_text: "Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no?». {n}Jae se encoge de hombros con un gesto alegre.{/n} «Seguro que tus sirvientes se pondrían felices por saber que su {mf|señor|señora} disfruta de su tiempo libre».

languages.text: 「なぜ？」{n}ジェイは陽気に肩をすくめた。{/n}「{mf|陛下|陛下}様の従者たちは、むしろ陛下が余暇を楽しんでいるって知った方が喜ぶんじゃないのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ？」{n}ジェイは陽気に肩をすくめた。{/n}「{mf|陛下|陛下}様の従者たちは、むしろ陛下が余暇を楽しんでいるって知った方が喜ぶんじゃないのかしら？」

languages.text: "Neden olmasın?" {n}Jae neşeyle omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarının, efendilerinin boş vaktini keyifle geçirdiğini görüp mutlu olmasını istemez misin?"
languages.original_text: "Why not?" {n}Jae shrugs cheerily.{/n} "Wouldn't your servants be happy to know that their {mf|master|mistress} spends {mf|his|her} leisure time enjoyably?"

traits.locale_text: "Neden olmasın?" {n}Jae neşeyle omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarının, efendilerinin boş vaktini keyifle geçirdiğini görüp mutlu olmasını istemez misin?"
